017package org.tribuo.regression.libsvm;
018
019import com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.config.Config;
020import com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.provenance.ConfiguredObjectProvenance;
021import com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.provenance.impl.ConfiguredObjectProvenanceImpl;
022import org.tribuo.common.libsvm.SVMType;
023import org.tribuo.regression.Regressor;
024
025/**
026 * The carrier type for LibSVM regression modes.
027 * <p>
028 * Supports C_SVC and NU_SVC.
029 */
030public class SVMRegressionType implements SVMType<Regressor> {
031    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
032
033    /**
034     * Type of regression SVM.
035     */
036    public enum SVMMode {
037        /**
038         * epsilon-insensitive SVR.
039         */
040        EPSILON_SVR(3),
041        /**
042         * optimization in dual space.
043         */
044        NU_SVR(4);
045
046        final int nativeType;
047
048        SVMMode(int type) {
049            this.nativeType = type;
050        }
051    }
052
053    @Config(mandatory=true,description="The SVM regression algorithm to use.")
054    private SVMMode type;
055
056    /**
057     * for olcut.
058     */
059    private SVMRegressionType() {}
060
061    public SVMRegressionType(SVMMode type) {
062        this.type = type;
063    }
064
065    @Override
066    public boolean isClassification() {
067        return false;
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public boolean isRegression() {
072        return true;
073    }
074
075    @Override
076    public boolean isAnomaly() {
077        return false;
078    }
079
080    @Override
081    public boolean isNu() {
082        return type == SVMMode.NU_SVR;
083    }
084
085    @Override
086    public int getNativeType() {
087        return type.nativeType;
088    }
089
090    @Override
091    public ConfiguredObjectProvenance getProvenance() {
092        return new ConfiguredObjectProvenanceImpl(this,"SVMType");
093    }
094}
